```{r}
library(tidyverse)

cran_code <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-11-12/loc_cran_packages.csv") %>%
  rename(file_count = file,
         blank_lines = blank,
         comment_lines = comment,
         code_lines = code)
```

```{r}
cran_code %>%
  View()
```
